title: Unable to pick between my chromas on Caitlyn
body: Since this last patch I can't choose my chroma on Caitlyn, it's not that I don't have it because I enter game with Rebel Caitlyn Pink. I just can't choose which chroma I want to use because the option has disappeared. Rito pls I want my green Cait.

replies.body:
Hey joyguy,

Thanks for the report! Is this occurring every game for you?

Yeah, whenever I cycle through the other skins and come back to the original one, it'll also leave the name of the last picked skin where it should say "Classic"
Do you think there's going to be a hotfix for it soon or will it be fixed in the next patch?
